bookSourceComment:
正常情况本书源无需代理，无需过验证，可直接使用，部分地区用户可能无法访问，需要开代理

欢迎使用晴天融合书源，融合书源支持番茄小说，七猫小说，喜马拉雅听书，懒人听书，番茄短剧，河马短剧，69书吧等几十中来源，地址：http://www.qingtian618.com
exploreUrl:
<js>
const data = [
    "玄幻魔法",
    "修真武侠",
    "言情小说",
    "历史军事",
    "游戏竞技",
    "科幻空间",
    "悬疑惊悚",
    "同人小说",
    "都市小说",
    "官场职场",
    "穿越时空",
    "青春校园"
];

let categorys = [];
const status = ["连载", "全本"];

for (let i of status) {
    categorys.push({
        title: i,
        url: `/ranking?status=${i}&page={{page}}`,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
        }
    });
    
    for (let j of data) {
        categorys.push({
            title: j,
            url: `/ranking?category=${j}&status=${i}&page={{page}}`,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
            }
        });
    }
}

categorys.push({
    title: "最新",
    url: "/ranking?new=1&page={{page}}",
    style: {
        layout_flexGrow: 1,
        layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
    }
});

for (let j of data) {
    categorys.push({
        title: j,
        url: `/ranking?category=${j}&new=1&page={{page}}`,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
        }
    });
}

categorys.push({
    title: "字数",
    url: "/ranking?wordNumber=1&page={{page}}",
    style: {
        layout_flexGrow: 1,
        layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
    }
});

for (let j of data) {
    categorys.push({
        title: j,
        url: `/ranking?category=${j}&wordNumber=1&page={{page}}`,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
        }
    });
}

JSON.stringify(categorys);
</js>

   head = JSON.stringify({ headers: { 'Cookie': ck } })
   url = u + "," + head

}
result
</js>

ruleContent.content: params = result.match(/params = '([^']+)'/)[1]; function decryptEncryptedData(encryptedData) { const encryptedDataWithIV = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse(encryptedData); const iv = CryptoJS.lib.WordArray.create(encryptedDataWithIV.words.slice(0, 16)); const encryptedBytes = encryptedDataWithIV.words.slice(4); const encryptedHex = CryptoJS.enc.Hex.stringify(CryptoJS.lib.WordArray.create(encryptedBytes)); const keyUtf8 = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse("5V&RoR%Jf@pJPydF"); const decrypted = CryptoJS.AES.decrypt( { ciphertext: CryptoJS.enc.Hex.parse(encryptedHex) }, keyUtf8, { iv: iv } ); const decryptedText = decrypted.toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8); return decryptedText; } img = String(decryptEncryptedData(params)).replace(/\\|\"/g,'').replace(/.*\[(.*)\].*/g,'$1').replace(/\,/g,'\n') let url="https://six.mhpic.net"; result=img.split('\n').map(x=>``).join('\n');
